ygData.subject: Re: Re: Some Thoughts (please read)
ygData.msgSnippet: On Feign Death working with 5-6 mobs hitting and casting, key word here is casting . If you feign while a mob is casting at you, it will always fail. You have
ygData.messageBody:
On Feign Death working with 5-6 mobs hitting and
casting, key word here is "casting". If you feign
while a mob is casting at you, it will always fail.
You have to wait for the mob to cast it's spell, take
the damage, and feign.



--- Dan Johnson <djohns02@...> wrote:
> On a whim, an enchanter and bard I regularly group
> with went to Lavastorm.
> We were all 17th level at the time. We found it
> tough going at first mainly
> because everytime we hit (and we monks do that a
> lot) most of the creatures
> there we were taking damage (darn shields).
>
> We now spend most of our time in Najena and tend to
> group with others our
> level and up to maybe level 22. We have the
> occassional bad situation but
> for the most part we are able to control the first
> third of the area.
>
> Last night was probably the worst. I was escorting
> someone to the zone and
> it seemed like everything came at us. We had 2 ogre
> guards, 4 earth
> elementals, 2 mist elementals, 1 fire elemental,
> probably 6 greater
> skeletons, a magician and her pet and to top it off
> a terror tentacle
> beating on us. We almost got them all. Mental
> Note: Feign Death is less
> likely to work when there are 5-6 mobs
> hitting/casting on you at the same
> time. This situation is pretty rare I have found.
>
> If you can bring along someone to 'cancel magic'
> when there is a shield, or
> root the runners/blast the runners both Lavastorm
> and Najena can be lots of
> fun.
>
> I digressed a bit. Sorry. Point is, we keep on
> coming back to Lavastorm
> and Najena.
>
>
